description:
Jil, Ki, and the gang arrive at the Shrine of Sky. The Golden Knights, as well as Melt and Coopa, who are all after Jil’s gang, arrive shortly after and also enter the shrine. Inside, the evil god Druaga awaits them. Jil and the others engage in a battle with Druaga once again. In the midst of the fighting, Ki suddenly takes the form of an adult, and reveals to Jil all of the mysteries: Kaaya’s wish, and why Jil had been betrayed. What is the connection between Kaaya and Ki? The story moves on the Mythical Tower...
Source: crunchyroll
